name: medichamite
effect: Held: Allows Medicham to Mega Evolve into Mega Medicham.
short_effect: Held: Allows Medicham to Mega Evolve into Mega Medicham.

flavor_text.sun-moon: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Medicham hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Medicham hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Medicham hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
